name: df-sslt
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(csslt, copab(s0, s1, w3a(wss(cv(s0), csur), wss(cv(s1), csur), wral(s2, cv(s0), wral(s3, cv(s1), wbr(cv(s2), cslt, cv(s3)))))))
comment: Define the relationship that holds iff one set of surreals completely precedes another. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Dec-2021.)
